      <h2 class="aclgrey">
       Our Services
      </h2>
     </div>
     <div class="text-center">
      <h3 class="aclgrey">
       Car Leasing
      </h3>
     </div>
     <p>
      Car leasing and contract hire is our most popular service and the service we are most known for. Car leasing is a financial agreement which makes getting a brand new vehicle most affordable and is quickly becoming more popular than other methods of finance such as HPI and PCP.
     </p>
     <p>
      Contract hire is available for both private individuals and businesses.
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="/about-leasing/">
       For more information about leasing please see here.
      </a>
     </p>
     <h3 class="aclgrey text-center">
      Fleet Services
     </h3>
     <p>
      We have a dedicated fleet service department who can seamlessly work with your transport manager or department with all aspects of fleet management such as vehicle replacement, new vehicle procurement as well as advice on fleet maintenance. Does your fleet need a revamp or perhaps youre looking to create a brand new fleet for the company? Get in touch with us today.
     </p>
     <h3 class="aclgrey text-center">
      Short term rental
     </h3>
     <p>
      If a long term contract is not what youre after then why not take a look at our short term rental section which holds a large choice of vehicles to suit any taste and requirement. Our short term rental can be for as little as 7 days to a whole year bridging the gap between rental and leasing.
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="/short-term-rental/">
       For more information on short term rental see here.
      </a>
     </p>
     <h3 class="aclgrey text-center">
      Why us?
     </h3>
     <p>
      Here at All Car Leasing we pride ourselves on our excellent prices, stellar service and expert advice. Weve been in the business for 20 years so weve learned a thing or two about our services and how to make our customers happy.
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="/about-us/">
       To find out more about us click here.
      </a>
     </p>

   <script>
    $(document).ready(function(){
 	$('.pre-loader').fadeOut('slow');
 	$('#cars-dropdown').on('show.bs.dropdown', function (e) {
 		e.preventDefault();
 		$('#vans-dropdown').removeClass('opened').find('.close-button').trigger('click');
 		$('#pickups-dropdown').removeClass('opened').find('.close-button').trigger('click');
 		$('#more-dropdown').removeClass('opened').children('ul').slideUp(1000);
 		$(this).toggleClass('opened');
 		$(this).children('ul').slideToggle(1000, 'swing');
 		$(this).find('.close-button').on('click',function (e) {e.preventDefault();  $('#cars-dropdown').children('ul').slideUp(1000, 'swing');});
 	});
 	$('#vans-dropdown').on('show.bs.dropdown', function (e) {
 		e.preventDefault();
 		$('#cars-dropdown').removeClass('opened').find('.close-button').trigger('click');
 		$('#pickups-dropdown').removeClass('opened').find('.close-button').trigger('click');
 		$('#more-dropdown').removeClass('opened').children('ul').slideUp(1000);
 		$(this).toggleClass('opened');
 		$(this).children('ul').slideToggle(1000, 'swing');
 		$(this).find('.close-button').on('click',function (e) {e.preventDefault();  $('#vans-dropdown').children('ul').slideUp(1000, 'swing');});
 	});
 	$('#pickups-dropdown').on('show.bs.dropdown', function (e) {
 		e.preventDefault();
 		$('#vans-dropdown').removeClass('opened').find('.close-button').trigger('click');
 		$('#cars-dropdown').removeClass('opened').find('.close-button').trigger('click');		
 		$('#more-dropdown').removeClass('opened').children('ul').slideUp(1000);
 		$(this).toggleClass('opened');
 		$(this).children('ul').slideToggle(1000, 'swing');
 		$(this).find('.close-button').on('click',function (e) {e.preventDefault();  $('#pickups-dropdown').children('ul').slideUp(1000, 'swing');});
 	});
 	$('#more-dropdown').on('show.bs.dropdown', function (e) {
 		e.preventDefault();
 		$('#vans-dropdown').removeClass('opened').find('.close-button').trigger('click');
 		$('#cars-dropdown').removeClass('opened').find('.close-button').trigger('click');		
 		$('#pickups-dropdown').removeClass('opened').find('.close-button').trigger('click');		
 		$(this).toggleClass('opened');
 		$(this).children('ul').slideToggle(1000, 'swing');
 		$(this).find('.close-button').on('click',function (e) {e.preventDefault();  $('#more-dropdown').children('ul').slideUp(1000, 'swing');});
 	});
 	$('#mobile-search').on('show.bs.dropdown', function (e) {
 		
 		$(this).children('ul').slideToggle(1000, 'swing', function(){
 			if ($(window).width() < 600) {
 				$('.slick-search').on('init', function(){
 					$('.slick-track').find('.sleggide').css({'min-width':$(window).width()-30 + 'px'});
 				}).slick({infinite:true,slidesToShow:1,slidesToScroll:1,swipeToSlide:false});
 			}
 		});
 		$(this).find('.close-button a').on('click',function (e) {e.preventDefault();  $('#mobile-search').children('ul').slideUp(1000, 'swing');});
 	});
 	
 	$('#mobile-search').on('show.bs.collapse', function (e) {		
 		if ($('#shownavigation').hasClass('in')) {
 			$('#shownavigation').removeClass('in');
 		}
 		
 		$(this).find('.close-button a').on('click',function (e) {e.preventDefault();  $('#mobile-search').slideUp(1000, 'swing');});

   <script>
    $(document).ready(function(){

 				var incs				=	[];

 				{
 					incs.push(i);
 				}
 				
 				var options				= 	{
 					start: [0, 750],
 					behaviour: 'tap',
 					connect: [true, false, true],
 					step: 25,

 						'min':0,
 						'max':750						
 					},
 					pips: {
 						mode: 'values',
 						values: incs,
 						density: 4,
 						format: wNumb({
 							thousand: ',',
 							decimals: 0,
 							prefix: '&pound;'
 						})
 					},
 					tooltips: false

   <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function(){
 				
 				$('div.advancedsearch').hide();
 				
 				$('a.advancedsearch').on('click', function(e){
 					e.preventDefault();
 					$('div.advancedsearch').slideToggle();
 				});
 				
 				if ($('.smaller').length > 0) {
 					var $height = $('.larger').height();
 					$('.smaller span').css({'height': $height + 'px'});
 				}
 				
 				$('.mf-toggle').on('click', function(e){
 					e.preventDefault();
 					$('.mobile-filters').toggleClass('open');
 				});
 				
 				if ($(window).width() < 600) {
 					$('a[href="#collapse1"]').trigger('click');
 				}
 				
 				
 				
 				$('.mobile-filters .close').on('click', function(){
 					$('.mf-toggle').trigger('click');
 				});
 				
 				$('.checkbox-add-on').on('click touchstart', function(){
 					var $rel	=	$(this).attr('rel');
 					
 					if ($rel == 'box-view') {
 						if ($('#view-changer').prop('checked')) {
 							$('#view-changer').prop('checked', false);
 							$('#view-changer').trigger('change');
 						}
 					}
 					else
 					{
 						if (!$('#view-changer').prop('checked')) {
 							$('#view-changer').prop('checked', true);
 							$('#view-changer').trigger('change');
 						}
 					}
 					
 				});
 				
 				$('#view-changer').on('change', function(){
 					if ($('.inf').length > 0) {
 						$('.inf').toggleClass('list');
 						$('.listshow').toggleClass('hidden');
 						$('.listonly').toggleClass('hidden');
 						$('.gridhide').toggleClass('hidden');
 						$('.boxonly').toggleClass('hidden');
 						
 						$('#businesslease').toggleClass('listview');
 						
 						$grid = $('.inf').isotope('layout');
 						
 						$src	=	'';
 						
 						$img = $('.srimage img').each(function(){
 							$src	=	$(this).attr('src');
 						});
 						
 						if ($('.badgearea .listonly').length < 1) {
 							$('.badgearea').append('<img src=\''+ $src +'\' class=\'listonly page-badge-img\' />');
 						}
 					}
 				
 				})
 				
 				$('form .input-group-addon').on('click touchstart', function(e){
 					$(this).closest('form').trigger('submit');
 				});
 				
 				
 				$('.header-manufacturer').hide();
 				$('.hm-inner .fa-close').on('click', function(){
 					$('.header-manufacturer').slideToggle();
 				});
 				if ($(window).width() > 600) {
 					$('.manudrop').on('click touchstart',function(e){
 						e.preventDefault();
 						$('.header-manufacturer').slideToggle();
 					});
 				}
 				
 				
 			});
   </script>
